short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for the Badí' Calender Extension, to show Badí' dates in Twitter web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a helper for the "Badíʿ Calendar" extension which shows today's date in the Badíʿ (Wondrous/Badi) calendar, the official calendar of the Bahá'í Faith. You must install both extensions for this one to work!

When you view a Twitter webpage at https://twitter.com/, today's date in the Wondrous calendar is displayed along each tweet!  (This extension does not read your tweets!)

The language used is set inside the main Badíʿ Calendar extension.
